descript.abstract: Land cover of Sedgwick Reserve and immediate surrounding area was mapped using 7.5m resolution AVIRIS imagery acquired in June 2017. Ten land cover classes were mapped based on dominant canopy composition using a random forest classifier with training samples acquired at the reserve during 2017 and 2018.
descript.purpose: General vegetation cover of Sedgwick Reserve, June 2017, intended to support reserve management and research planning.

idinfo.datacred: Gabriel Daldegan, UCSB Department of Geography

citeinfo.title: Sedgwick Reserve 2017 vegetation map
citeinfo.origin: Department of Geography University of California
citeinfo.othercit: Sedgwick Reserve Vegetation, June 2017. La Kretz Center for Research at Sedgwick Reserve.
